entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow mixed with rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
